summary: Sixteen American college students drink, flirt, fight and canoodle during their Spring Break vacation in Cancun, Mexico.
cast: Benjamin Fletcher|Nicole Frilot|Roxanne Frilot|David Ingber|Jeremy Jazwinski|Amber Madison|Paul Malbry|Marquita 'Sky' Marshall|Laura Ramsey|Matthew Slenske|Alan Taylor|Heidi Vance|Jorell Washington|Casey Weeks|Sarah Wilkins|Chris Desanti|Jason Karlinski|Grant George|Adam Miller|Hot Action Cop|Simple Plan|Snoop Dogg
title: The Real Cancun
